org.araneaframework.uilib.form.converter
Class BaseConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.converter.BaseConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter, FormElementAware, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigIntegerToIntegerConverter, BigIntegerToLongConverter, BooleanToLongConverter, BooleanToYNConverter, IdenticalConverter, ListConverter, ReverseConverter, StringToBigDecimalConverter, StringToBooleanConverter, StringToIntegerConverter, StringToLongConverter, TimestampToDateConverter
public abstract class BaseConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Converter

This class is the base class for form converters. The converters' task is to convert the value of form Control to the value of FormElement Data and back.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

convert

public java.lang.Object convert(java.lang.Object data)
This method converts the data from one type to another. If the data is null then null is returned. Otherwise convertNotNull(Object)method is used for actual conversion.

Specified by:
convert in interface Converter
Parameters:
data - Data to convert.
Returns:
Converted data.

reverseConvert

public java.lang.Object reverseConvert(java.lang.Object data)
This method converts the data from one type to another (though the types are exchanged in comparison with convert(Object)). If the data is null then null is returned. Otherwise reverseConvertNotNull(Object)method is used for actual conversion.

Specified by:
reverseConvert in interface Converter
Parameters:
data - Data to convert.
Returns:
Converted data.

newConverter

public abstract Converter newConverter()
This method should return a new converter, of the same type that the class that overrides it, however freshly initialized.

Specified by:
newConverter in interface Converter
Returns:
a new converter, of the same type that the class that overrides it, however freshly initialized.

convertNotNull

protected abstract java.lang.Object convertNotNull(java.lang.Object data)
This method should convert the data from one type to another. It may assume that the data is never null.

Parameters:
data - Data to convert.
Returns:
Converted data.

reverseConvertNotNull

protected abstract java.lang.Object reverseConvertNotNull(java.lang.Object data)
This method should convert the data from one type to another. It may assume that the data is never null. The types of data are reversed in comparison to convertNotNull(Object).

Parameters:
data - Data to convert.
Returns:
Converted data.
